SELECT ,t.name AS "tagName",ab.company as "businessName" FROM ad_product a left join ad_tag t on a.tag = t.id
WHERE first_tag is not null and a.is_marketable =1 order by first_tag ,tag DESC
SELECT ,ab.company as "businessName" FROM ad_product a WHERE a.is_marketable =1 and a.id = #{id}
SELECT ,t.name AS "tagName",ab.company as "businessName" FROM ad_product a left join ad_tag t on a.tag = t.id WHERE a.is_marketable =1 and a.first_category = #{catagoryId} order by a.sort DESC

SELECT ,t.name AS "tagName",ab.company as "businessName" FROM ad_product a left join ad_tag t on a.tag = t.id
WHERE a.is_marketable =1
and a.second_category = #{catagoryId}
and a.first_tag = #{firstTag}
order by a.create_date desc,a.sort DESC
order by a.buy_end_time desc,a.sort DESC
order by a.discount,a.sort DESC
SELECT ,t.name AS "tagName",ab.company AS "businessName" FROM ad_product a left join ad_tag t on a.tag = t.id WHERE a.id = #{productId}

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.name_spell AS "name_spell", ab.id AS "businessId", a.is_marketable AS "isMarketable", CASE WHEN a.business_price is NULL then a.market_price ELSE a.business_price END AS "marketPrice", ab.discount AS "discount", a.link_url_wechat AS "linkUrlWechat", a.tag AS "tag", a.is_hot AS "isHot", a.first_tag AS "firstTag", a.unit AS "unit", a.first_category AS "firstCategory", a.second_category AS "secondCategory", a.buy_upper_limit AS "buyUpperLimit", a.buy_start_time AS "buyStartTime", a.buy_end_time AS "buyEndTime", a.image_wechat AS "imageWechat", a.total_stock AS "totalStock", a.used_stock AS "usedStock", a.remind_stock AS "remindStock", a.description AS "description", a.recommend_reason AS "recommendReason", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.category_id AS "categoryId", ab.company AS "businessName", a.hits_count AS "hitsCount", a.shipping_method AS "shippingMethod" FROM ad_product a JOIN ad_business ab ON a.business_id = ab.business_id join ad_business_area_conn abac on ab.id = abac.business_id JOIN ad_area aa on abac.area_id = aa.id where a.is_marketable=1 and a.is_hot =1 and (aa.name =#{address} or aa.id =2) GROUP BY a.id
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ad_product a WHERE (a.buy_end_time >=now() AND a.buy_start_time <=now())

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.image_wechat AS "imageWechat", a.name AS "name", a.market_price AS "marketPrice", a.sell_count AS "sellCount", a.user_rebate AS "userRebate", a.bussiness_rebate AS "bussinesRebate", a.link_url_wechat AS "linkUrlWechat", a.layered_rebate AS "layeredRebate", a.shipping_method AS "shippingMethod", ab.id AS "businessId", IFNULL(ab.discount,0) AS "discount", ab.logo AS "businessLogo", ab.company AS "businessName", IFNULL(ab.max_user_rebate,0) AS "maxUserRebate", ab.deal_type AS "dealType" FROM ad_product a left join ad_business ab on a.business_id= ab.business_id WHERE (a.buy_end_time >=now() AND a.buy_start_time <=now())
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
ORDER BY a.market_price ASC
ORDER BY a.market_price DESC
ORDER BY a.sell_count DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
